medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient noted severe right upper quadrant pain 2 days ago, which resolved after vomiting. He then noted itching yesterday and presented to the emergency department. The abdominal pain has since resolved, and he is without complaints.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Chronic atrial fibrillation, coronary artery disease, status post septal myocardial infarction, mitral regurgitation, aortic regurgitation, hypertension, dyslipidemia, left bundle branch block, chronic kidney disease, gouty arthritis, hypothyroidism, fatty mass in the left mid abdomen (possible liposarcoma but declined further workup).
medical_history.family_history: Mother - unknown; Father - unknown; Siblings - deceased sister, old age; Children - the patient, hypertension, and dyslipidemia.
